Unseen Things

An independent production company based in The New Forest, Hampshire

This is an umbrella company for projects led by James Carney across theatre, film, television, audio, and other art forms. It was created in order to produce the live audio-drama podcast The Unseen Hour, and to develop scripts. It now also encompasses a small business in mask- and puppet-making - False Faces

  • False Faces: Masks, puppets, and training - False Faces Instagram
  • New Forest Clown Lab: Experimentation, training and idiocy in the Forest - NF Clown Lab Instagram
  • James Carney: Actor, mask-maker, writer, director etc. - Personal Instagram
